plot outline: The film is set with a backdrop of the fisherman's colony, It takes you on a journey in to the past, full of sentiments and drama, only to reveal a mystery that leads to emotional action-packed revenge. Can he manage to avenge at all? Story based on fisherman's colony atmosphere along with flashback mystery and mother sentiments besides love story and emotional revenge action drama.
title: Udumba
plot: Story based on fisherman's colony atmosphere along with flashback mystery and mother sentiments besides love story and emotional revenge action drama Genre - Love and Action drama
